ABOUT EDGEBOMBER 
EdgeBomber is an interactive installation / a "Pervasive =
Games".
The player uses tape, stickers and scissors to create his own playg=
round on a wall; the system grabs the scenery and creates a virtual level f=
or our jump-n-run video game based on our game-engine "Z100". 
The grabbed =
playground is extended with items and enemies and is projected back to the =
original scenery. Thus a mixed media / augmented reality level is created, =
where our hero "ozkar" has to resist the attacks of hubert and the evil fly=
ing sausage. 
The game creates a mixture of reality and virtual game, the c=
reation of the level is part of the game. 

StandUp and start stickin!


--=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
---

HectorCS
